CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(RW_Welcome_Call_Status__c) == 'Reject', Today()- RW_Welcome_Call_Rejected_date__c, IF( (RW_Welcome_Call_Rejected_date__c != null && RW_Welcome_Call_Reinitiate_date__c != null), RW_Welcome_Call_Reinitiate_date__c - RW_Welcome_Call_Rejected_date__c,0))
CustomField.label: Welcome Call Rejected Days
